alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued March 08 at 2:37PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surf heights of 8 to 10 ft will impact south facing shores. * TIMING...through Sunday night * IMPACTS...High Surfs and Rip Currents Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 237 AOAULI ASO LULU MATI 8 2023 ...O loo faaauau Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...Galu Maualuluga e 8 i le 10 futu o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute. * TAIMI...seia oo i le po o le Aso Sa * AAFIAGA...Galu Maualuluga ma le Aave o le Sami FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
